title: @Rioters; Question about the upcoming Marksman Update
body:
Can we get a brief description on who's getting the Buffs/Nerfs/QoL changes for the upcoming patch(which i believe was/is 5.20?)? It would really ease some of us to know exactly which of our strongly favored AD Carries are about to get hit with something good/bad.
{{champion:22}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:67}}

replies.body: Marksmen changes (both kits and items) will be coming in the preseason (at least a couple of patches after 5.20). We're not quite ready to talk about all the details of that yet, still sorting out exactly what will and won't be included. At a guess we should be ready to share details just after Worlds finishes, possibly slightly before.
any changes to Crit(-RNG) finally?
He just said after or slightly before worlds finishes.

well, they should know by now if they are willing to finally change the goddamn RNG or not if they want to change it within a month...i donßt expect a real in-depth answer, just a general yes or no would do.
Also i like to remind him that it´s still one of the biggest issues of the game and he sort of wanted to look into it last year already (http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-gameplay/hbEj1jWi-can-we-finally-phase-crits-rngesus-out-of-the-game).

From his answer, if they *are* working on Crit, they probably aren't sure if the changes being tested will end up being released.

They may be scrapped.

That seems enough to avoid confirming or denying it.

> [{quoted}](name=Don Eulrich,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5eUGXXoI,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-10-08T18:52:36.018+0000)
>
> any changes to Crit(-RNG) finally?

This. Please.

>We're not quite ready to talk about all the details of that yet, still sorting out exactly what will and won't be included.

How does that work?  Is the stuff that won't get included for the preseason patch likely to be released early in the next season but you can't finish it in time for 5.2X or whatever?
Some things will ship in the preseason. Some things will prove to be good ideas that need more time, so they'll get delayed. Some things won't work out as hoped and will get scrapped.
More like not everything they are currently testing will get into the game at any point.
Can you at least tell us if any of them are getting a VU along with the update, even if only a small one ?

This will be gameplay driven updates. There'll be a few visual modifications to support kit changes, but nothing that qualifies as a visual upgrade. Think the same sort of levels of art adjustments as the juggernaut changes in 5.16.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5eUGXXoI,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2015-10-09T00:00:59.757+0000)
>
> This will be gameplay driven updates. There'll be a few visual modifications to support kit changes, but nothing that qualifies as a visual upgrade. Think the same sort of levels of art adjustments as the juggernaut changes in 5.16.

So, some Marksmen might actually _lose_ particles and effects, even those separating different skins on the same champion?  Are you saying that some marksmen might actually get Mordekaiser-level nerf to their visual effects?   Morde lost a bunch of unique effects among most of his skins after the Juggernaut update, effects he's not going to get back because you're done with him for the time being.

I'm afraid of what you guys have planned for the future if this is the case.
add item don't remove any and bring back FoN for the laugh.
i have faith you guys will make my fav adc {{champion:104}}  even more fun (an actually feel like hes using a shotgun) <3

Can you atleast tell us, if this class rework will involve all ADC's or simply those you've deemed as necessary. I'd like to see at least small modifications to Twitch and Trist for instance, since i feel they don't quite capture the lategame hypercarry feel. Maybe some changes to Varus to shave off some of his wierd mechanics and focus him into a specific niche as a poke ADC...or the famed Urgot rework finally comming out, assuming he'll still be an ADC after it...

Will these changes directly affect Kindred as well?

Also, will Essence Reaver be changed?

I'd love to see {{champion:81}} 's ult and W get more usefulness as AD Carry Ezreal, without hurting AP Ezreal.
Maybe it's time it gets the attack speed slow back, giving him more of an anti-carry niche.
Also {{champion:81}} VU hype?
I really have hopes for something in Quinn's favor as a botlane ADC, its a shame that such a cool champion concept is shelved as an option by almost the entire playerbase...

my suggestion about Essence Reaver and Bloodthirster
BT has 20% lifesteal while Reaver has 10% lifesteal
i think we should give the shield to reaver instead BT

Reaver shield example 
10% of the damage done generates shield up to X maximum

BT shield removed
I'd Morde aswell. He might not be a marksmen, but he sure needs all the attention for a "bot-(hue)-laner".

Unless things have changed...

Quinn is getting a remake.

Koggy is getting some tweaks, though we don't know exactly what they're going to consist of.

Those are the only straight answers I've gotten thus far about the upcoming preseason work.
Miss Fortune too. She's getting a revamp.
